titleStmt.title: The planters manual, being instructions for the raising, planting, and cultivating all sorts of fruit-trees, whether stonefruits or pepin-fruits, with their natures and seasons very useful for such as are curious in planting and grafting / by Charles Cotton.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, Charles, 1630-1687.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
